revised_title: Rescaling Perturbation Series for Schrödinger Eigenvalue Problems
tldr: The article demonstrates that rescaling a perturbation series can yield accurate analytic approximations to eigenvalues in divergent-asymptotic perturbation problems. This approach is applied to various regimes, including the perturbation regime and the W.K.B. regime, and is shown to be effective in accurately estimating eigenvalues for Schrödinger eigenvalue problems.
